basic_information.scholarship_name: Brisch Family Music Scholarship for Strings-NOMINATION
basic_information.scholarship_notes: Awarded in the Fall by the String Faculty.

description: This scholarship was established in 2014 to provide critical support to the strings division in the UCO School of Music for the purpose of student recruitment and retention. The scholarship is generously funded by Gisela Bridge, sister of the late Dr. Hans Brisch, as well as Dr. Margaret Brisch. Bearing the Brisch family name, this scholarship represents excellence in music performance and scholarly pursuits. Eligibility Any strings student Requirements AWARDED BY COMMITTEE NOMINATION. Nominated student(s) will be invited to apply by the college's scholarship coordinator.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
